block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Try out this amazing origami Flapping Butterfly by Deg Farelly. The full name of this model is actually "Intermediate Flapping Butterfly", Deg Farelly has a simpler version. However, this one just seems a lot cooler . Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Flapping Butterfly by Deg Farelly
meta_keywords: Heap Art Origami Tutorial, Heap Art, origami, tutorial, video, how to, short video, vertical video, flapping butterfly by deg farelly, Deg Farelly
